title: New Poster For The Interstellar 10th Anniversary IMAX 70MM Release
description: We have a new poster for the Interstellar 10th-anniversary IMAX 70MM release on December 6th. Tickets are on sale now, and additional tickets will be available later this month.
author: Kaitlyn Booth
excerpt: Ever since the pandemic, people have wondered if there is even a market for movie theaters. There absolutely is, and there is even a market for people who want to see movies in special formats with limited releases. We have seen several films and filmmakers give their projects IMAX 70MM releases along with some re-releases [‚Ä¶]
text: Posted in: Movies, Warner Bros | Tagged: christopher nolan, interstellarWe have a new poster for the Interstellar 10th-anniversary IMAX 70MM release on December 6th. Tickets are on sale now, and additional tickets will be available later this month. Ever since the pandemic, people have wondered if there is even a market for movie theaters. There absolutely is, and there is even a market for people who want to see movies in special formats with limited releases. We have seen several films and filmmakers give their projects IMAX 70MM releases along with some re-releases of projects in that format as well. Unfortunately, there aren't a ton of theaters that can handle that format, so if you want to see films in that format, you might be going on a road trip. Christopher Nolan has cultivated a fanbase of people who want to see his films in the biggest and best formats possible. We saw that with the¬†Tenet re-release and now we're coming up on the 10th anniversary of¬†Interstellar.¬†That movie is also getting a IMAX 70MM release for the anniversary and we got a new poster to go along with it. The official IMAX website also has some more details about the screening, including that tickets are on sale now, but additional tickets will be available later this month, and what theaters will be hosting the screenings. Courtesy of Warner Bros. Pictures ¬© 2014/2024 Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. All Rights Reserved. INTERSTELLAR returns to select theatres with a¬†10th¬†Anniversary IMAX Exclusive Limited Engagement on December 6, 2024 presented in 70mm IMAX film and IMAX Digital. Shot with IMAX Film Cameras, IMAX will proudly present INTERSTELLAR in IMAX 70mm film. Tickets are on sale now for select 70mm IMAX film locations with additional tickets to IMAX digital locations on sale later in November. html:
Posted in: Movies, Warner Bros | Tagged: christopher nolan, interstellar

We have a new poster for the Interstellar 10th-anniversary IMAX 70MM release on December 6th. Tickets are on sale now, and additional tickets will be available later this month.

Ever since the pandemic, people have wondered if there is even a market for movie theaters. There absolutely is, and there is even a market for people who want to see movies in special formats with limited releases. We have seen several films and filmmakers give their projects IMAX 70MM releases along with some re-releases of projects in that format as well. Unfortunately, there aren't a ton of theaters that can handle that format, so if you want to see films in that format, you might be going on a road trip. Christopher Nolan has cultivated a fanbase of people who want to see his films in the biggest and best formats possible. We saw that with the¬†Tenet re-release and now we're coming up on the 10th anniversary of¬†Interstellar.¬†That movie is also getting a IMAX 70MM release for the anniversary and we got a new poster to go along with it. The official IMAX website also has some more details about the screening, including that tickets are on sale now, but additional tickets will be available later this month, and what theaters will be hosting the screenings.

Academy Award¬Æ-winning director Christopher Nolan's landmark epic INTERSTELLAR celebrates its 10th anniversary this year. INTERSTELLAR returns to select theatres with a¬†10th¬†Anniversary IMAX Exclusive Limited Engagement on December 6, 2024 presented in 70mm IMAX film and IMAX Digital.

Shot with IMAX Film Cameras, IMAX will proudly present INTERSTELLAR in IMAX 70mm film. Tickets are on sale now for select 70mm IMAX film locations with additional tickets to IMAX digital locations on sale later in November.

Participating INTERSTELLAR: IMAX Exclusive in IMAX 70mm film theatres:

United States

  • Dallas, TX ‚Äì Cinemark Dallas & IMAX
  • Fort Lauderdale, FL ‚Äì AutoNation IMAX, Museum of Discovery & Science
  • Indianapolis, IN ‚Äì IMAX, Indiana State Museum
  • Irvine, CA ‚Äì Regal Edwards Irvine Spectrum & IMAX
  • New York, NY ‚Äì AMC Lincoln Square 13 & IMAX
  • San Francisco, CA ‚Äì AMC Metreon 16 & IMAX
  • Tempe, AZ ‚Äì Harkins Arizona Mills 25 & IMAX
  • Universal City, CA ‚Äì Universal Cinema AMC at CityWalk Hollywood & IMAX

Canada

  • Regina, SK ‚Äì Kramer IMAX, Saskatchewan Science Centre

Enjoyed this? Please share on social media!

Stay up-to-date and support the site by following Bleeding Cool on Google News today!

Kaitlyn is the Editor-in-Chief at Bleeding Cool. Film critic and pop culture writer since 2013. Ace. Leftist. Nerd. Feminist. Writer. Replicant Translator. Cinephillic Virtue Signaler. She/Her. UFCA/GALECA Member. üçÖ Approved. Follow her Threads, Instagram, and Twitter @katiesmovies.

New Poster For The Interstellar 10th Anniversary IMAX 70MM Release

We have a new poster for the Interstellar 10th-anniversary IMAX 70MM release on December 6th. Tickets are on sale now, and additional tickets will be available later this month.

Simon Kinberg Will Reportedly Write & Produce A New Star Wars Trilogy

Lucasfilm has reportedly secured a deal with Simon Kinberg to write and produce a new Star Wars trilogy.

Wicked: More Featurettes Spotight Boq, Nessarose, And The Wizard

The Wicked featurette marketing blitz continues, and this time, they spotlight the characters Boq, Nessarose, and The Wizard.

Nosferatu: 4 New High-Quality Images Have Been Released

Focus Features has released more high-quality images from Robert Eggers's upcoming Nosferatu, which will be released on December 25th.

Mickey 17 Has Been Delayed From January To April

Warner Bros. has reportedly decided to shift the release date of Bong Joon Ho's Mickey 17 from January 2025 to April 2025.

The Legend Of Zelda Live-Action Film Gets A Large Release Window

The live-action adaptation of The Legend of Zelda has a release window, and while it's pretty massive, it's good that we have some idea of when it'll be released.

Bruce Springsteen Biopic Adds Maron, Hoffman, Krumholtz To Cast

Today, the Bruce Springsteen biopic Deliver Me From Nowhere added three more to its cast. The film is now in production.

I Know What You Did Last Summer Sequel Adds Four More To Cast

I Know What You Did Last Summer rounded out the cast today, adding four more to the production. It releases in theaters next summer.
